text: While self-awareness and self-regulation are important aspects of using digital media, it's essential to recognize that the design of digital platforms is often intended to capture and retain our attention, making it challenging to maintain a healthy balance. The constant notifications, tailored content, and addictive features can easily lead to excessive use and negative impacts on our mental health. By limiting the influence of digital media, we can free ourselves from these manipulative tactics and regain control over our time and focus.
